QueryDefinition.Query: With ch AS( select person_id from {sc}.chunk_person where chunk_id = {0} ), constype AS( select code, text from {sc}.lookup where lookup_type_id = 18 ), x AS( select distinct c.eventdate, c.patid, c.staffid, concat(c.patid,to_char(c.eventdate,'YYYYMMDD'), coalesce(con.constype, 99)) as temp_visit_occurrence_id, -- nextval('{sc}.visit_detail_id_seq') as visit_occurrence_id, MOD(c.patid, 100000) as care_site_id, m.readcode, m.desc, constype.text as description, con.constype from ch join {sc}.Clinical c on c.patid = ch.person_id join {sc}.consultation con on c.patid = con.patid and c.consid = con.consid left join constype on constype.code = con.constype left join {sc}.Medical m on (c.medcode = m.medcode) -- where c.eventdate is not null -- and con.eventdate is not null ) select x.*, nextval('{sc}.visit_detail_id_seq') as visit_occurrence_id from x order by x.patid
